summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3565, for the improvement of the alley in block 16, Mt. Baker Park Addition, being the alley between Mt. Baker Boulevard and Hanford Street, and extending from Mt. Baker Circle to 33rd Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 44083 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
